column4: hi guys, i'll apreciate if someone help me with this: i've to make a new project on netbeans from existing sources, but the sources are on an ubuntu server machine on my network, I can access it perfectly on my machine, but on netbeans there is no way to open it, any idea about this?

hi guys, i'll apreciate if someone help me with this: i've to make a new project on netbeans from existing sources, but the sources are on an ubuntu server machine on my network, I can access it perfectly on my machine, but on netbeans there is no way to open it, any idea about this?
how do you know you can't access it?
because there is no way to open it from netbeans
